title: When jhin is out, will he have a discount?!!!

replies.body: Champions now are released as 7800 ip and 975 rp and after a week it is discounted to 6300 ip and another champion in the 6300 ip is reduced to 4800 (Varus is next)  and they mainly come out with the bundle roughly around 1200-1500 rp
He will cost exactly 7800 IP upon release assuming they go with the usual pricing.

New champions NEVER have a discount. Champions actually cost more IP upon release and dont get discounted until 3-4 months after their release date.

The only discount you get is if you buy the champion and release skin bundle. You get the skin for half price or something.
